info.title: AQAR API Documentation
info.description: Multi-tenant real estate management API with three authentication guards: Admin, User (Landlord/Tenant Owner), and Tenant User.

get.description: Returns paginated list of categories

post.description: Create a new category

get.description: Get a specific category

delete.description: Delete a category

post.description: Bulk delete categories

get.description: Returns all active categories with their sub-categories and child-categories
Returns all active brands
Returns all available colors
Returns all available sizes
Returns all available tags

post.description: Create a new blog category

get.description: Get a specific blog category by ID

delete.description: Delete a blog category. Cannot delete if category has associated posts.

409.description: Cannot delete category with associated posts

patch.description: Toggle the active status of a blog category

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by title, content, or tags

delete.description: Soft delete a product

Toggle product between active and inactive status

get.description: Get the current shopping cart with all items. For guests, include X-Cart-Token header.

delete.description: Remove all items from the shopping cart

post.description: Add a product to the shopping cart. Creates a new cart if none exists.

X-Cart-Token.description: New cart token for guests (only on first request)

put.description: Update the quantity of an item in the cart. Set quantity to 0 to remove.

delete.description: Remove an item from the shopping cart

post.description: Apply a coupon code to the cart for a discount

delete.description: Remove the applied coupon from the cart

put.description: Update shipping and billing addresses for the cart

get.description: Get a summary of the cart totals

post.description: Merge a guest cart into the authenticated user cart on login

get.description: Returns available shipping methods based on the delivery address
Returns available payment methods configured for the tenant

post.description: Calculate shipping, tax, and total amounts based on selected options
Process the checkout, create the order, and initiate payment
Handle payment gateway webhooks (Stripe, PayPal, etc.)

get.description: Verify the payment status of an order after redirect from payment gateway
Get paginated list of published products with filtering and sorting options
Get detailed information about a product by its slug
Search products by name, description, or tags
Get products related to the specified product (same category)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of related products to return

get.description: Get paginated reviews for a product

post.description: Submit a review for a product (requires authentication)

get.description: Get list of all product categories with optional subcategories
Get products in a specific category
Get all available filter options (colors, sizes, brands, price range)

parameters.description: Get filters specific to a category

post.description: Authenticate an admin user and receive a bearer token
Revoke the current admin authentication token

get.description: Retrieve the authenticated admin profile with roles and permissions

post.description: Revoke current token and issue a new one
Request a password reset link via email. Always returns success to prevent email enumeration.

200.description: Password reset link sent (or not found, but same response for security)

message.example: If an account exists with this email, you will receive a password reset link.

post.description: Reset admin password using the token received via email

message.example: Password reset successfully. Please login with your new password.
The password confirmation does not match.

items.example: The password confirmation does not match.

post.description: Register a new end-user within a tenant. Requires tenant context via route parameter.

message.example: Registration successful. Please verify your email.

post.description: Authenticate a tenant end-user and receive bearer token
Revoke the current tenant user authentication token

get.description: Retrieve the authenticated tenant user profile

post.description: Revoke current token and issue a new one
Verify email address with code sent via email

200.description: Email verified successfully or already verified

post.description: Resend email verification code

200.description: Verification email sent or already verified

post.description: Request a password reset link via email. Always returns success to prevent email enumeration.

200.description: Password reset link sent (or not found, same response for security)

post.description: Reset tenant user password using the token received via email

400.description: Invalid or expired reset token or tenant context required

get.description: Returns the current two-factor authentication status for the user.

post.description: Generates a new 2FA secret and returns a QR code to scan with authenticator app.

message.example: Scan the QR code with your authenticator app

post.description: Verifies the OTP code from authenticator app and enables 2FA for the account.

400.description: 2FA already enabled or setup not initiated

post.description: Disables two-factor authentication. Requires password confirmation.
Completes the login process by verifying the 2FA code. Use this after receiving a requires_2fa response from login.

device_token.description: Device token if remember_device was true

get.description: Returns a list of trusted devices for the authenticated user.

delete.description: Removes all devices from the trusted devices list.

message.example: All trusted devices have been revoked.

delete.description: Removes a device from the trusted devices list.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: The ID of the trusted device to revoke

message.example: Device has been removed from trusted devices.

post.description: Register a new landlord/tenant owner user. Email verification required.

message.example: Registration successful. Please verify your email.
The email has already been taken.

post.description: Authenticate a landlord/tenant owner user and receive bearer token. If 2FA is enabled, returns a two_factor_token instead.
Revoke the current user authentication token

get.description: Retrieve the authenticated user profile with tenants and payment info

post.description: Revoke current token and issue a new one
Verify user email address with code sent via email

200.description: Email verified successfully or already verified

post.description: Resend email verification code

200.description: Verification email sent or already verified

post.description: Request a password reset link via email. Always returns success to prevent email enumeration.

200.description: Password reset link sent (or not found, same response for security)

post.description: Reset user password using the token received via email
Login or register using social providers (Google/Facebook). Requires OAuth2 access token from provider.

is_new_user.description: Whether this is a new registration

400.description: Unable to retrieve email from provider

get.description: Get paginated list of all administrators with optional filters

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by name, email, or username

post.description: Create a new administrator account

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific administrator

delete.description: Delete an administrator account

message.example: You cannot delete your own account

put.description: Update the password of a specific administrator

get.description: Retrieves current SMTP settings. Password is always masked.

put.description: Updates SMTP settings for sending emails. Leave password empty to keep existing password.

post.description: Sends a test email to verify SMTP configuration is working correctly

get.description: Retrieves a list of all available email templates with their current configuration
Retrieves a specific email template by its ID

put.description: Updates a specific email template by its ID

get.description: Retrieves a list of all available languages with their status and configuration.

parameters.name: active_only
parameters.description: Filter to show only active languages

post.description: Creates a new language with the provided name, code, direction, and status.

get.description: Retrieves detailed information for a specific language including translation statistics.

put.description: Updates an existing language with the provided details.

delete.description: Deletes a language. Cannot delete the default language.

post.description: Sets the specified language as the default language for the application.

patch.description: Toggles the active/inactive status of a language. Cannot deactivate the default language.

get.description: Exports all translations for a language as a JSON file.

post.description: Imports translations from a JSON object or file. Can merge with existing translations or replace all.

merge.description: Whether to merge with existing translations

post.description: Synchronizes translations with the default language file, adding any missing keys.

Reorder the features of a price plan

put.description: Update an existing role and its permissions

delete.description: Delete a role. Protected roles (super-admin) cannot be deleted.

get.description: Get list of all available permissions, optionally grouped by module
Retrieves all settings for a specific group (general, email, seo, payment, tenant, appearance, typography, third_party, gdpr, pages)

put.description: Updates multiple settings at once for a specific group

put.description: Updates a single setting value by its key

Returns all settings organized by groups

get.description: Search settings by key pattern

Close a support ticket

get.description: Get support ticket statistics (open, pending, closed counts)
Retrieves all translations for a language, optionally filtered by group.

put.description: Updates multiple translations at once for a specific language.

get.description: Searches translations by key or value for a specific language.

422.description: Search query is required and must be at least 2 characters

get.description: Returns translation keys that are missing or untranslated (same as source language).

missing_keys.description: Key-value pairs where value is the source text

patch.description: Updates a single translation key-value pair.

get.description: Get all active price plans with features for public display

Get a comparison matrix of all active plans with feature availability

post.description: Check if a coupon code is valid for a plan

get.description: Retrieves a list of all active languages available for the application. No authentication required.
Returns the currently active language based on request headers or session.
Returns all translations for a specific language code. Useful for frontend localization.
Get the authenticated user's currently active subscription
Get paginated subscription history for the authenticated user

post.description: Start the subscription flow. Returns payment options and a pending payment log.
Complete the subscription after successful payment
Cancel an active subscription
Create a renewal payment for an existing subscription
Upgrade current subscription to a new plan (prorated pricing)

404.description: No active subscription or plan not found

get.description: Get paginated list of the authenticated user's support tickets

message.example: Cannot reply to a closed ticket

post.description: Close your own support ticket

get.description: Get list of active support departments for ticket creation
Get all tenants/properties owned by the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new tenant/property. Database setup is asynchronous and may take a few moments.

subdomain.description: Unique subdomain identifier (lowercase, alphanumeric with hyphens)

201.description: Tenant created successfully (database setup in progress)

message.example: Tenant created. Database setup is in progress.

422.description: Validation error (subdomain taken, invalid plan, etc.)

message.example: Failed to create tenant: Database error

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific tenant owned by the authenticated user, including database status

404.description: Tenant not found or access denied

message.example: Tenant not found or access denied

put.description: Update settings of a specific tenant owned by the authenticated user

404.description: Tenant not found or access denied

message.example: Tenant not found or access denied

delete.description: Permanently delete a tenant and its database. This action cannot be undone.

404.description: Tenant not found or access denied

message.example: Tenant not found or access denied
Failed to delete tenant: Error details

post.description: Switch to a specific tenant context and receive a new token scoped to that tenant. Use this token to access tenant-specific resources.

200.description: Tenant context switched successfully - use the new token for tenant-specific requests

404.description: Tenant not found or access denied

message.example: Tenant not found or access denied

425.description: Too Early - Tenant database is not ready yet

message.example: Tenant database is not ready yet. Please wait.
Failed to switch tenant: Error details

get.description: Check if the tenant database has been created and is ready for use

404.description: Tenant not found or access denied

message.example: Tenant not found or access denied

post.description: Manually trigger tenant database setup. Use this if automatic setup failed or to retry database creation.

200.description: Database setup completed or already exists

404.description: Tenant not found or access denied

message.example: Tenant not found or access denied
